title: Loft Revival in Polanco
description: A sleek, urban loft transformation combining open-plan living with strategic zoning. Custom-built shelving, integrated lighting, and a muted palette create a sophisticated yet inviting atmosphere.

title: Coastal Retreat in Cancún
description: A light-filled beachfront apartment with soft textures and natural accents. Pale woods, airy fabrics, and sea-inspired hues bring the ocean’s tranquility indoors.

title: Classic Colonial in Monterrey
description: A heritage home refurbished to highlight its original architectural details. Rich wood tones, patterned textiles, and antique fixtures blend tradition with modern comfort.

title: Minimalist Studio in Guadalajara
description: A compact studio optimized for multifunctional living. Clean lines, hidden storage, and a neutral palette maximize space and light for urban professionals.

title: Family Haven in Mérida
description: A warm, family-friendly home featuring vibrant accents and durable finishes. Custom cabinetry, cozy nooks, and playful patterns ensure both style and practicality.
